((ooc-so sue me ill rewrite))

SageFirestorm-Last option

Changeling-Yep

::they stand up and fire 1 laser blast::

SageFirestorm and Changeling-Jets maximum burn

:;they fly through the trees and get some branches on them::

Sagefirestorm-this will be fun indeed

::he pulls out a capsule like thin butt it has a pushdown button::

changeling-bombs away,if she dont want her help will put em all to 
slag

::he presses the button and throws it down into the forest::

sagefirestorm-3..2..1..wait i just rembered,thats not the explosive 
pill,thats the nerve gas

changeling-ho crap lets get out of here

::they fly off just as a cloud of nerve gas shoots up::
